_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY Jexactyl PANEL - jexactyl.com
name: Retroactyl Proxy
author: egg@unfazium.cloud
description: Minecraft server software selector for Proxy servers, compatible with both ARM64 and Intel or AMD-based hardware. Select from Bungeecord, Bungeecord-Geyser, Velocity, Velocity-Geyser and WaterdogPE.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

# Ensure SERVER_SOFTWARE is defined (if it’s empty, set it to Bungeecord by default)
SERVER_SOFTWARE="${SERVER_SOFTWARE:-Bungeecord}"

# Helper function for Java installation
install_java_21() {
    if ! java -version 2>&1 | grep "21" &> /dev/null; then
        echo "Java 21 is not installed. Installing Java 21..."
        if command -v apk &> /dev/null; then
            apk update
            apk add --no-cache openjdk21
        elif command -v apt-get &> /dev/null; then
            apt-get update
            apt-get install -y openjdk-21-jdk
        elif command -v yum &> /dev/null; then
            yum install -y java-21-openjdk
        else
            echo "Java installation failed. Please install Java 21 manually."
            exit 1
        fi
    else
        echo "Java 21 is already installed."
    fi
}

# Main installation section
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server || { echo "Failed to navigate to /mnt/server"; exit 1; }

case "$SERVER_SOFTWARE" in

"Bungeecord")
    echo "Starting Bungeecord installation..."
    install_java_21
	cd /mnt/server

	if [ -z "${BUNGEE_VERSION}" ] || [ "${BUNGEE_VERSION}" == "latest" ]; then
    	BUNGEE_VERSION="lastStableBuild"
	fi

	curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} https://ci.md-5.net/job/BungeeCord/${BUNGEE_VERSION}/artifact/bootstrap/target/BungeeCord.jar
        
    # Bungeecord startup command with unix_args.txt check
    echo 'java -Xms128M -XX:MaxRAMPercentage=95.0 -jar server.jar' > startup.sh
    ;;

"Bungeecord-Geyser")
    echo "Starting Bungeecord Geyser+Floodgate installation..."
    install_java_21
	cd /mnt/server

	if [ -z "${BUNGEE_VERSION}" ] || [ "${BUNGEE_VERSION}" == "latest" ]; then
    	BUNGEE_VERSION="lastStableBuild"
	fi

	curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} https://ci.md-5.net/job/BungeeCord/${BUNGEE_VERSION}/artifact/bootstrap/target/BungeeCord.jar

 	# Download Geyser plugin
    echo "Installing Geyser plugin..."
    mkdir -p plugins
    curl -L -o plugins/Geyser-BungeeCord.jar \
        "https://download.geysermc.org/v2/projects/geyser/versions/latest/builds/latest/downloads/bungeecord"

    # Download Floodgate plugin
    echo "Installing Floodgate plugin..."
    curl -L -o plugins/floodgate-bungee.jar \
        "https://download.geysermc.org/v2/projects/floodgate/versions/latest/builds/latest/downloads/bungee"
        
    # Bungeecord startup command with unix_args.txt check
    echo 'java -Xms128M -XX:MaxRAMPercentage=95.0 -jar server.jar' > startup.sh
    ;;

"Velocity")
    echo "Starting Velocity installation..."
    install_java_21
    PROJECT=velocity
    SERVER_JARFILE=server.jar

    cd /mnt/server || { echo "Failed to cd /mnt/server"; exit 1; }

    # Lowercase helper
    lc() {
        echo "$1" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]'
    }

    # If a direct download link is provided, use it
    if [ -n "${DOWNLOAD_LINK}" ]; then
        echo "Using provided DOWNLOAD_LINK"
        DOWNLOAD_URL="${DOWNLOAD_LINK}"
    else
        # Determine version (use latest if not specified or 'latest')
        if [ -z "${VELOCITY_VERSION}" ] || [ "$(lc "$VELOCITY_VERSION")" = "latest" ]; then
            VELOCITY_VERSION=$(curl -fsSL "https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/${PROJECT}" | jq -r '.versions[-1]')
            echo "Using latest: ${VELOCITY_VERSION}"
        else
            # verify user supplied version exists; if not, fall back to latest
            VER_EXISTS=$(curl -fsSL "https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/${PROJECT}" \
                | jq -r --arg v "$VELOCITY_VERSION" '.versions[] | select(.==$v)')
            if [ -z "$VER_EXISTS" ]; then
                echo "Requested version ${VELOCITY_VERSION} not found — falling back to latest"
                VELOCITY_VERSION=$(curl -fsSL "https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/${PROJECT}" | jq -r '.versions[-1]')
            fi
            echo "Using Velocity version: ${VELOCITY_VERSION}"
        fi

        # Fetch builds metadata for the selected version
        BUILDS_JSON=$(curl -fsSL "https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/${PROJECT}/versions/${VELOCITY_VERSION}")

        # Determine build number (use latest if not specified or invalid)
        if [ -z "${BUILD_NUMBER}" ] || [ "$(lc "$BUILD_NUMBER")" = "latest" ]; then
            BUILD_NUMBER=$(echo "$BUILDS_JSON" | jq -r '.builds[-1]')
            echo "Using latest build: ${BUILD_NUMBER}"
        else
            BUILD_EXISTS=$(echo "$BUILDS_JSON" | jq -r --arg b "$BUILD_NUMBER" '.builds[] | tostring | select(.==$b)')
            if [ -z "$BUILD_EXISTS" ]; then
                echo "Requested build ${BUILD_NUMBER} not found for version ${VELOCITY_VERSION} — using latest"
                BUILD_NUMBER=$(echo "$BUILDS_JSON" | jq -r '.builds[-1]')
            fi
        fi

        # Construct jar download URL
        JAR_NAME="${PROJECT}-${VELOCITY_VERSION}-${BUILD_NUMBER}.jar"
        DOWNLOAD_URL="https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/${PROJECT}/versions/${VELOCITY_VERSION}/builds/${BUILD_NUMBER}/downloads/${JAR_NAME}"
    fi

    echo "Download URL: ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"

    # Backup existing jar
    if [ -f "${SERVER_JARFILE}" ]; then
        echo "Backing up existing ${SERVER_JARFILE} -> ${SERVER_JARFILE}.old"
        mv -f "${SERVER_JARFILE}" "${SERVER_JARFILE}.old"
    fi

    # Download Velocity jar
    echo "Downloading Velocity jar..."
    if ! curl -fSL -o "${SERVER_JARFILE}" "${DOWNLOAD_URL}"; then
        echo "Failed to download Velocity from ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"
        [ -f "${SERVER_JARFILE}.old" ] && mv -f "${SERVER_JARFILE}.old" "${SERVER_JARFILE}"
        exit 1
    fi

    # velocity.toml: fetch default if missing
    if [ -f velocity.toml ]; then
        echo "velocity.toml already exists"
    else
        echo "Downloading default velocity.toml"
        curl -fsSL "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/parkervcp/eggs/master/game_eggs/minecraft/proxy/java/velocity/velocity.toml" -o velocity.toml || {
            echo "Failed to fetch sample — creating minimal config"
            cat > velocity.toml <<'EOF'
config-version = "2.6"
motd = "<#09add3>A Velocity Server"
player-info-forwarding-mode = "NONE"
forwarding-secret-file = "forwarding.secret"
EOF
        }
    fi

    # forwarding.secret: create if missing
    if [ -f forwarding.secret ]; then
        echo "forwarding.secret already exists"
    else
        echo "Creating forwarding.secret"
        if command -v sha256sum >/dev/null 2>&1; then
            date +%s | sha256sum | head -c 24 > forwarding.secret
        else
            head -c 24 /dev/urandom | base64 | tr -d '\n' > forwarding.secret
        fi
    fi

    # Write startup.sh — use unix_args.txt if present
    if [ -f unix_args.txt ] && [ -s unix_args.txt ]; then
        UARGS=$(cat unix_args.txt)
        echo "java ${UARGS} -jar ${SERVER_JARFILE}" > startup.sh
    else
        echo "java -Xms128M -XX:MaxRAMPercentage=95.0 -XX:+UseG1GC -XX:G1HeapRegionSize=4M -XX:+UnlockExperimentalVMOptions -XX:+ParallelRefProcEnabled -XX:+AlwaysPreTouch -XX:MaxInlineLevel=15 -jar ${SERVER_JARFILE}" > startup.sh
    fi
    chmod +x startup.sh
    ;;

"Velocity-Geyser")
    echo "Starting Velocity Geyser+Floodgate installation..."
    install_java_21
    PROJECT=velocity
    SERVER_JARFILE=server.jar

    cd /mnt/server || { echo "Failed to cd /mnt/server"; exit 1; }

    # Lowercase helper
    lc() {
        echo "$1" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]'
    }

    # If a direct download link is provided, use it
    if [ -n "${DOWNLOAD_LINK}" ]; then
        echo "Using provided DOWNLOAD_LINK"
        DOWNLOAD_URL="${DOWNLOAD_LINK}"
    else
        # Determine version (use latest if not specified or 'latest')
        if [ -z "${VELOCITY_VERSION}" ] || [ "$(lc "$VELOCITY_VERSION")" = "latest" ]; then
            VELOCITY_VERSION=$(curl -fsSL "https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/${PROJECT}" | jq -r '.versions[-1]')
            echo "Using latest: ${VELOCITY_VERSION}"
        else
            # verify user supplied version exists; if not, fall back to latest
            VER_EXISTS=$(curl -fsSL "https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/${PROJECT}" \
                | jq -r --arg v "$VELOCITY_VERSION" '.versions[] | select(.==$v)')
            if [ -z "$VER_EXISTS" ]; then
                echo "Requested version ${VELOCITY_VERSION} not found — falling back to latest"
                VELOCITY_VERSION=$(curl -fsSL "https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/${PROJECT}" | jq -r '.versions[-1]')
            fi
            echo "Using Velocity version: ${VELOCITY_VERSION}"
        fi

        # Fetch builds metadata for the selected version
        BUILDS_JSON=$(curl -fsSL "https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/${PROJECT}/versions/${VELOCITY_VERSION}")

        # Determine build number (use latest if not specified or invalid)
        if [ -z "${BUILD_NUMBER}" ] || [ "$(lc "$BUILD_NUMBER")" = "latest" ]; then
            BUILD_NUMBER=$(echo "$BUILDS_JSON" | jq -r '.builds[-1]')
            echo "Using latest build: ${BUILD_NUMBER}"
        else
            BUILD_EXISTS=$(echo "$BUILDS_JSON" | jq -r --arg b "$BUILD_NUMBER" '.builds[] | tostring | select(.==$b)')
            if [ -z "$BUILD_EXISTS" ]; then
                echo "Requested build ${BUILD_NUMBER} not found for version ${VELOCITY_VERSION} — using latest"
                BUILD_NUMBER=$(echo "$BUILDS_JSON" | jq -r '.builds[-1]')
            fi
        fi

        # Construct jar download URL
        JAR_NAME="${PROJECT}-${VELOCITY_VERSION}-${BUILD_NUMBER}.jar"
        DOWNLOAD_URL="https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/${PROJECT}/versions/${VELOCITY_VERSION}/builds/${BUILD_NUMBER}/downloads/${JAR_NAME}"
    fi

    echo "Download URL: ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"

    # Backup existing jar
    if [ -f "${SERVER_JARFILE}" ]; then
        echo "Backing up existing ${SERVER_JARFILE} -> ${SERVER_JARFILE}.old"
        mv -f "${SERVER_JARFILE}" "${SERVER_JARFILE}.old"
    fi

    # Download Velocity jar
    echo "Downloading Velocity jar..."
    if ! curl -fSL -o "${SERVER_JARFILE}" "${DOWNLOAD_URL}"; then
        echo "Failed to download Velocity from ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"
        [ -f "${SERVER_JARFILE}.old" ] && mv -f "${SERVER_JARFILE}.old" "${SERVER_JARFILE}"
        exit 1
    fi

    # velocity.toml: fetch default if missing
    if [ -f velocity.toml ]; then
        echo "velocity.toml already exists"
    else
        echo "Downloading default velocity.toml"
        curl -fsSL "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/parkervcp/eggs/master/game_eggs/minecraft/proxy/java/velocity/velocity.toml" -o velocity.toml || {
            echo "Failed to fetch sample — creating minimal config"
            cat > velocity.toml <<'EOF'
config-version = "2.6"
motd = "<#09add3>A Velocity Server"
player-info-forwarding-mode = "NONE"
forwarding-secret-file = "forwarding.secret"
EOF
        }
    fi

    # forwarding.secret: create if missing
    if [ -f forwarding.secret ]; then
        echo "forwarding.secret already exists"
    else
        echo "Creating forwarding.secret"
        if command -v sha256sum >/dev/null 2>&1; then
            date +%s | sha256sum | head -c 24 > forwarding.secret
        else
            head -c 24 /dev/urandom | base64 | tr -d '\n' > forwarding.secret
        fi
    fi

 	# Download Geyser plugin
    echo "Installing Geyser plugin..."
    mkdir -p plugins
    curl -L -o plugins/Geyser-Velocity.jar \
        "https://download.geysermc.org/v2/projects/geyser/versions/latest/builds/latest/downloads/velocity"

    # Download Floodgate plugin
    echo "Installing Floodgate plugin..."
    curl -L -o plugins/floodgate-velocity.jar \
        "https://download.geysermc.org/v2/projects/floodgate/versions/latest/builds/latest/downloads/velocity"

    # Write startup.sh — use unix_args.txt if present
    if [ -f unix_args.txt ] && [ -s unix_args.txt ]; then
        UARGS=$(cat unix_args.txt)
        echo "java ${UARGS} -jar ${SERVER_JARFILE}" > startup.sh
    else
        echo "java -Xms128M -XX:MaxRAMPercentage=95.0 -XX:+UseG1GC -XX:G1HeapRegionSize=4M -XX:+UnlockExperimentalVMOptions -XX:+ParallelRefProcEnabled -XX:+AlwaysPreTouch -XX:MaxInlineLevel=15 -jar ${SERVER_JARFILE}" > startup.sh
    fi
    chmod +x startup.sh
    ;;

"WaterdogPE")
    echo "Starting WaterdogPE installation..."
    install_java_21
    mkdir -p /mnt/server
    cd /mnt/server || exit 1

    # Set jar filename
    SERVER_JARFILE_PE="Waterdog.jar"

    # Download latest WaterdogPE release from GitHub
    echo "Downloading latest Waterdog PE build..."
    curl -fSL -o "${SERVER_JARFILE_PE}" \
        https://github.com/WaterdogPE/WaterdogPE/releases/latest/download/Waterdog.jar

    # Download config.yml if missing
    if [ ! -f config.yml ]; then
        echo "Downloading Waterdog PE config.yml..."
        curl -fSL -o config.yml \
            https://raw.githubusercontent.com/parkervcp/eggs/master/game_eggs/minecraft/proxy/bedrock/waterdog_pe/config.yml
    else
        echo "Waterdog PE config.yml exists — skipping"
    fi

    # Write startup script pointing to correct jar
    echo "java -Dterminal.ansi=true -Xms128M -XX:MaxRAMPercentage=95.0 -jar ${SERVER_JARFILE_PE}" > startup.sh
    chmod +x startup.sh
    ;;

*)
    echo "Unrecognized server software: $SERVER_SOFTWARE. Defaulting to Bungeecord latest."
    echo "Starting Velocity installation..."
    install_java_21
    PROJECT=velocity
    SERVER_JARFILE=server.jar

    cd /mnt/server || { echo "Failed to cd /mnt/server"; exit 1; }

    # Lowercase helper
    lc() {
        echo "$1" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]'
    }

    # If a direct download link is provided, use it
    if [ -n "${DOWNLOAD_LINK}" ]; then
        echo "Using provided DOWNLOAD_LINK"
        DOWNLOAD_URL="${DOWNLOAD_LINK}"
    else
        # Determine version (use latest if not specified or 'latest')
        if [ -z "${VELOCITY_VERSION}" ] || [ "$(lc "$VELOCITY_VERSION")" = "latest" ]; then
            VELOCITY_VERSION=$(curl -fsSL "https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/${PROJECT}" | jq -r '.versions[-1]')
            echo "Using latest: ${VELOCITY_VERSION}"
        else
            # verify user supplied version exists; if not, fall back to latest
            VER_EXISTS=$(curl -fsSL "https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/${PROJECT}" \
                | jq -r --arg v "$VELOCITY_VERSION" '.versions[] | select(.==$v)')
            if [ -z "$VER_EXISTS" ]; then
                echo "Requested version ${VELOCITY_VERSION} not found — falling back to latest"
                VELOCITY_VERSION=$(curl -fsSL "https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/${PROJECT}" | jq -r '.versions[-1]')
            fi
            echo "Using Velocity version: ${VELOCITY_VERSION}"
        fi

        # Fetch builds metadata for the selected version
        BUILDS_JSON=$(curl -fsSL "https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/${PROJECT}/versions/${VELOCITY_VERSION}")

        # Determine build number (use latest if not specified or invalid)
        if [ -z "${BUILD_NUMBER}" ] || [ "$(lc "$BUILD_NUMBER")" = "latest" ]; then
            BUILD_NUMBER=$(echo "$BUILDS_JSON" | jq -r '.builds[-1]')
            echo "Using latest build: ${BUILD_NUMBER}"
        else
            BUILD_EXISTS=$(echo "$BUILDS_JSON" | jq -r --arg b "$BUILD_NUMBER" '.builds[] | tostring | select(.==$b)')
            if [ -z "$BUILD_EXISTS" ]; then
                echo "Requested build ${BUILD_NUMBER} not found for version ${VELOCITY_VERSION} — using latest"
                BUILD_NUMBER=$(echo "$BUILDS_JSON" | jq -r '.builds[-1]')
            fi
        fi

        # Construct jar download URL
        JAR_NAME="${PROJECT}-${VELOCITY_VERSION}-${BUILD_NUMBER}.jar"
        DOWNLOAD_URL="https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/${PROJECT}/versions/${VELOCITY_VERSION}/builds/${BUILD_NUMBER}/downloads/${JAR_NAME}"
    fi

    echo "Download URL: ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"

    # Backup existing jar
    if [ -f "${SERVER_JARFILE}" ]; then
        echo "Backing up existing ${SERVER_JARFILE} -> ${SERVER_JARFILE}.old"
        mv -f "${SERVER_JARFILE}" "${SERVER_JARFILE}.old"
    fi

    # Download Velocity jar
    echo "Downloading Velocity jar..."
    if ! curl -fSL -o "${SERVER_JARFILE}" "${DOWNLOAD_URL}"; then
        echo "Failed to download Velocity from ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"
        [ -f "${SERVER_JARFILE}.old" ] && mv -f "${SERVER_JARFILE}.old" "${SERVER_JARFILE}"
        exit 1
    fi

    # velocity.toml: fetch default if missing
    if [ -f velocity.toml ]; then
        echo "velocity.toml already exists"
    else
        echo "Downloading default velocity.toml"
        curl -fsSL "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/parkervcp/eggs/master/game_eggs/minecraft/proxy/java/velocity/velocity.toml" -o velocity.toml || {
            echo "Failed to fetch sample — creating minimal config"
            cat > velocity.toml <<'EOF'
config-version = "2.6"
motd = "<#09add3>A Velocity Server"
player-info-forwarding-mode = "NONE"
forwarding-secret-file = "forwarding.secret"
EOF
        }
    fi

    # forwarding.secret: create if missing
    if [ -f forwarding.secret ]; then
        echo "forwarding.secret already exists"
    else
        echo "Creating forwarding.secret"
        if command -v sha256sum >/dev/null 2>&1; then
            date +%s | sha256sum | head -c 24 > forwarding.secret
        else
            head -c 24 /dev/urandom | base64 | tr -d '\n' > forwarding.secret
        fi
    fi

    # Write startup.sh — use unix_args.txt if present
    if [ -f unix_args.txt ] && [ -s unix_args.txt ]; then
        UARGS=$(cat unix_args.txt)
        echo "java ${UARGS} -jar ${SERVER_JARFILE}" > startup.sh
    else
        echo "java -Xms128M -XX:MaxRAMPercentage=95.0 -XX:+UseG1GC -XX:G1HeapRegionSize=4M -XX:+UnlockExperimentalVMOptions -XX:+ParallelRefProcEnabled -XX:+AlwaysPreTouch -XX:MaxInlineLevel=15 -jar ${SERVER_JARFILE}" > startup.sh
    fi
    chmod +x startup.sh
    ;;
esac

# Final setup and permissions
chmod +x startup.sh
echo "The installation process has been completed. Please click the Start button to continue."

variables.name: Minecraft Version
variables.description: Installs the latest version of Minecraft for your selected server software

variables.name: Server Software
variables.description: Write the server software to install: Bungeecord, Bungeecord-Geyser, Velocity, Velocity-Geyser or WaterdogPE

variables.name: Download Path
variables.description: A URL to use to download a server.jar rather than the ones in the install script. This is not user viewable.

variables.name: Bungeecord Version
variables.description: The version of Bungeecord to download and use.

variables.name: Velocity Version
variables.description:
The Velocity Proxy version to download.
Set to 'latest ' the download the last stable build.

variables.name: Geyser Port
variables.description:
The UDP port that Geyser will listen on
"-1" will forcibly stop Geyser
"server" will have Geyser listen on the same port as the TCP server

variables.name: Waterdog PE Version
variables.description:
The build to pull and install. (Ex. 23), or set to latest
This is the build number on https://jenkins.waterdog.dev/

variables.name: Server Jar File PE
variables.description: The jar to run to WaterdogPE
